Package org.forgerock.openidm.maintenance.upgrade

Class UpdateManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.maintenance.upgrade.UpdateManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateManager
public class UpdateManagerImpl extends Object implements UpdateManager
Basic manager to initiate the product maintenance and upgrade mechanisms.

    • listRepoUpdates

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue listRepoUpdates(Path archivePath) throws UpdateException
      Description copied from interface: UpdateManager
      List repo updates present in a given archive or the currently pending update
      Specified by:
      listRepoUpdates in interface UpdateManager
      Parameters:
      archivePath - The archive file to list repo updates for or null to use the the currently pending update
      Returns:
      A json list of objects representing each repo update
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to generate repo update list

      Returns:

    • report

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue report(Path archiveFile, Path installDir) throws UpdateException
      Description copied from interface: UpdateManager
      Provide a report of which files have been changed since they were installed.
      Specified by:
      report in interface UpdateManager
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      Returns:
      a json response listed changed files by state

      UpdateException

    • diff

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue diff(Path archiveFile, Path installDir, String filename) throws UpdateException
      Description copied from interface: UpdateManager
      Return the diff of a single file to show what changes will be made if we overwrite the existing file.
      Specified by:
      diff in interface UpdateManager
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      filename - the file to diff
      Returns:
      a json response showing the current file, the new file, and the diff
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to perform diff

    • upgrade

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue upgrade(Path archiveFile, Path installDir, String userName) throws UpdateException
      Description copied from interface: UpdateManager
      Perform the upgrade.
      Specified by:
      upgrade in interface UpdateManager
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      userName - the name of the user who initiated the update install
      Returns:
      a json response with the report of what was done to each file
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to perform upgrade

    • getLicense

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getLicense(Path archiveFile) throws UpdateException
      Description copied from interface: UpdateManager
      Return the license for a given update archive. Defaults to the license found in the current OpenIDM deployment if the archive does not contain a license file.
      Specified by:
      getLicense in interface UpdateManager
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - Path to the archive to search for a license file.
      Returns:
      json object containing the license.
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to provide a license.
